name: Edo World, Inc.
description: Edo World, Inc. is a global leader in digital marketing solutions, specializing in delivering data-driven strategies for brands looking to enhance their online presence and customer engagement. Founded in 2010, Edo World has rapidly evolved into a full-service digital marketing agency, combining innovative technology with creative expertise to provide comprehensive marketing services. The company offers a wide range of services, including search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click advertising (PPC), social media marketing, content creation, and email marketing. Edo World is recognized for its ability to harness the power of data analytics to drive measurable results, helping businesses of all sizes navigate the complexities of the digital landscape. The company's mission is to empower brands to connect with their audiences effectively and to maximize their return on investment through tailored digital marketing strategies. With a commitment to staying ahead of industry trends, Edo World is continuously evolving its offerings to include the latest technologies, such as artificial intelligence and machine learning in marketing automation. The company prides itself on its customer-centric approach, ensuring that each client receives personalized service and support to achieve their unique business goals.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

faq.answer: Jessica Smith is the CEO of Edo World, Inc.

faq.answer: Edo World is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.
